title: Тайна Снежной королевы
overview: Тайна Снежной королевы (The Mystery of the Snow Queen) is a fairy tale about the extraordinary journey of the modest little girl Gerda. She is looking for her friend Kay, whom the Snow Queen, a powerful evil sorceress, kidnapped and took to her kingdom. On the way to the Snow Queen, Gerd falls into the castle of the cunning, insidious and at the same time funny king, meets forest brigands. On the way, the girl will have many obstacles, but Gerda's faithful heart will overcome them all ...Based on famous Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tale.
